text: Municipium Cives Romanorum Felicitas Julia Olisipo (in Latin: Olisippo or Ulyssippo ; in , Olissipṓn, or Ὀλισσιπόνα, Olissipóna) was the ancient name of modern-day Lisbon while it was part of the Roman Empire. == Gallery == File:Hispania roads.svg| Roman roads in Hispania File:Barragem romana Belas1.JPG | Roman dam of Belas, near Lisbon File:Sítio Arqueológico de Colaride 03.jpg | Archaeological Site of Colaride File:Vila Romana de Frielas1.JPG | Roman villa of Frielas ==References== Category:Lisbon
title: Olissipo
